title: MgAl-LDH nanoflowers as a novel sensing material for high-performance humidity sensing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21991-21998
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03800B, Paper

Luyu Wang, Jia Song, Chunyang Yu
The novel QCM humidity sensor based on MgAl-LDH nanoflowers has superior humidity sensitivity and the ability to detect human respiration.
